text: Dahan-e Falezak () is the district center of Shahrak District in Ghor Province, Afghanistan. It is located on at 2,385 m altitude. Very close to it is situated the village of Shahrak, which gives the name of the district. ==References== ==See also== *Ghōr Province Category:Populated places in Ghor Province
title: Dahan-e Falezak
